page.title: 05Leafield C.E. Primary School
page.content: Our school is in the middle of the village green. There are 52 children and 6 more 5 year olds who come just mornings. There are 31 juniors and 27 infants. We have two teachers, a secretary, helper, caretaker and two dinner ladies. Our dinners are cooked at the next school, Minster Lovell. Fourteen people from the village help each week in school. We do maths, reading, writing, art, P.E., computer work and choosing. We play Queenie, Off Ground Tig, Ball Tig, and Chain Tag.A Playgroup meets for five sessions in the school Village Room. Approx. 40 children from the area attend. A Toddler group, started by the Vicar,meets every Thursday afternoon in the Village Room.A Youth Club for the school children meets every Thursday evening.Brownies meet on Wednesdays.
